A computer is a device that can be programmed to do calculations automatically
It can run programs to do different tasks
A computer system is a complete computer that includes the hardware, operating system, and other equipment
It can also refer to a group of computers connected and working together
The Industrial Revolution saw the development of mechanical devices to automate tasks, while the 20th century saw the development of electrical machines for analog calculations
The Digital Revolution began with the invention of semiconductor transistors in the late 1940s, leading to the microcomputer revolution in the 1970s
